item.title: No. 12 Michigan State Routs USC, Hands Trojans 1st Back-to-Back Losses This Season
item.description: The Spartans blew out the Trojans on Monday night to improve to 13-2.

item.title: No. 14 Iowa Defeats Northwestern to Improve to 13-2
item.description: Ava Heiden scored 23 points to help No. 14 Iowa beat Northwestern and hand the Wildcats their ninth straight loss.

item.title: USC Trojans vs. No. 12 Michigan State Spartans Highlights üèÄ FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the best moments from this Big Ten showdown between the USC Trojans and the No. 12 Michigan State Spartans!

item.title: No. 10 Nebraska Avoids 1st Loss After Furious Late Rally in Win vs. Ohio State
item.description: No. 10 Nebraska, with help from a standout effort by Braden Frager off the bench, hung on late to beat surging Ohio State and extend the best start to...

item.title: Michigan States' Coen Carr Posterizes Defender with Slam Dunk vs. USC
item.description: Michigan State Spartans forward Coen Carr delivered a posterizing slam dunk against the USC Trojans.
